storm_awakening_mission.name: Storm Awakening
storm_awakening_mission.description: The skies above have grown restless. Investigate the strange storms gathering in the Ethereal Expanse by defeating 5 Storm Elementals.

cloud_conquest_mission.name: Cloud Conquest
cloud_conquest_mission.description: The Cloud Kingdom seeks brave adventurers. Defeat 4 Cloud Wisps and 3 Sky Archers to prove your worth.

storm_kingdom_entry.name: Path to the Storm Peaks
storm_kingdom_entry.description: The Storm Peaks call to those who would challenge the storms. Defeat 4 Thunder Beasts and 3 Wind Drakes to earn the right to climb.

star_sanctuary_seeker.name: Seeker of Stars
star_sanctuary_seeker.description: The Star Sanctuary holds ancient knowledge. Collect 5 Star Shards and 3 Celestial Feathers to prove your dedication to the stars.

titan_slayer_mission.name: Titan Slayer
titan_slayer_mission.description: The Thunder Titan terrorizes the Storm Peaks. Assemble a party and defeat this colossal enemy to bring peace to the mountain.

cloud_king_boss_mission.name: Audience with the Cloud King
cloud_king_boss_mission.description: The Cloud King has summoned worthy heroes. Journey to the Cloud Kingdom and face this majestic but deadly ruler.

void_gap_crisis.name: Void Gap Crisis
void_gap_crisis.description: The Void Gap has widened, threatening to consume the Ether. Brave the rift and defeat 5 Void Heralds to slow the spread.

storm_sovereign_boss_mission.name: Dethrone the Storm Sovereign
storm_sovereign_boss_mission.description: The Storm Sovereign rules the Void Gap with terror. Gather your strongest allies and challenge this ancient being to save the Ether.

collect_celestial_materials.name: Celestial Collection
collect_celestial_materials.description: Gather rare materials from across the Ether: 8 Storm Crystals, 6 Celestial Feathers, and 4 Cloud Pearls.

sky_master.name: Master of the Sky
sky_master.description: Complete all Ether content by defeating all mod bosses: Cloud King, Thunder Titan, and Storm Sovereign.

celestial_observatory_quest.name: Secrets of the Observatory
celestial_observatory_quest.description: The Celestial Observatory seeks scholars. Answer 3 celestial riddles by collecting ancient star charts hidden throughout the Ether.

storm_peaks_explorer.name: Conquer the Storm Peaks
storm_peaks_explorer.description: Map the dangerous Storm Peaks by defeating 6 Storm Elementals, 4 Thunder Beasts, and 2 Storm Sentinels.
